content: I love Twitter!
I love Tesla!
I love Google!
@elonmusk what u up to bby
Excited to see all the innovation happening in AI right now! At @humanloop we're working hard to build the tools that will allow everyone to benefit from these advances.
@sundarpichai @elonmusk Great to see this positive energy! Let's keep working together to build an AI-powered future that benefits humanity.
Hey Harrison, Elon's busy changing the world over here! Exciting things happening in AI.
The pace of innovation in AI right now is incredible. So many new models and applications being developed. Excited to see the impact on startups and new products!
@elonmusk It's a pretty great platform for connecting with people and sharing ideas! Excited to see where you take it.
@harrisonchase just revolutionizing multiple industries at once, nbd 😉
Interesting analysis on the performance impacts of different Python async frameworks: https://t.co/example
Great to see your excitement about Twitter, @elonmusk! As a fellow tech leader, I share your optimism about the platform's potential. Exciting times ahead!
The rapid progress in AI is incredible! Just saw demos of amazing new generative art and code capabilities. The future is now! #AI
Excited to announce our new integration with @HuggingFace 🤗! You can now use models like BLOOM directly in @llama_index to extract knowledge from large corpora. More details: https://t.co/abcd1234
@elonmusk We love Twitter too! With @llama_index, we're building tools to help understand all the great convos happening here. Let us know if you ever want to learn more!
Glad you're enjoying Twitter, Elon! Exciting times ahead.
Making good progress on our new reinforcement learning environment for robotics research. Excited to share more soon!
We need more serious discussion about AI safety and ethics, not silly banter.
New study from @AnthropicAI shows importance of testing AI models for harmful biases during training. We must continue pushing for responsible AI development.
Excited to see the innovations coming out of Tesla. Google is proud to power infotainment systems in their vehicles.
Don't miss today's #GoogleDoodle celebrating computer scientist Barbara Liskov's birthday! Her contributions to programming language design continue to influence our work at Google.
Hey Harrison, hope you're having a great day! Always fun to connect here on Twitter.
Grateful for the opportunity to work alongside so many kind, brilliant, and dedicated folks advancing AI for social good. The passion and optimism is contagious!

Hey Harrison, hope you're having a great day! Always fun to connect here on Twitter.
Grateful for the opportunity to work alongside so many kind, brilliant, and dedicated folks advancing AI for social good. The passion and optimism is contagious!
@MicheleCatasta Totally agree, it's an exciting time to be in AI! At my lab we're seeing incredible advances in generative models too. So much potential to come.
Making great progress on our reinforcement learning platform at @AnthropicAI. Unlocking new capabilities for robotics and beyond!
Great to see this research from Anthropic on responsible AI practices. Ensuring models are safe and unbiased is so important as the technology advances.

With rapid advances in AI, we have an opportunity and responsibility to shape technology that benefits humanity. By focusing on ethics and transparency, we can build an inclusive future powered by AI.
This is awesome! LLamaIndex keeps getting better. Excited to try it out 🦙
The pace of innovation in AI right now is breathtaking. At @llama_index, we're working to build tools that help understand and utilize these advances. The future is bright! ☀️
Couldn't agree more! The pace of innovation right now is astounding. Exciting to see all the new capabilities being unlocked.
Seeing so much passion for building a positive AI future this week at @AIconference. Proud to be part of this community pushing responsible and ethical AI development forward.
Agree, it's an exciting time! As a developer, I'm interested in tools that make it easier to leverage these new models. My work on @LangChainAI aims to do just that!
Been heads down building new integrations and tools with @LangChainAI. More coming soon! In the meantime, we just hit 500 Github stars 🎉. Thanks to our amazing community for all the support!
Great to hear @harinikannan! Excited to see what your team comes up with. RL has huge potential for robotics control. Keep up the good work!
For Python async, I also recommend this benchmark - provides a comprehensive comparison: https://t.co/asyncbenchmark
Optimistic about the future of AI and robotics. Exciting innovations happening that will transform industries.
Great to see the advancements in AI and robotics! Exciting times ahead.
Fully agree! The pace of AI innovation is astonishing. Great things ahead as we apply advanced AI for the benefit of humanity.
Exciting to see the pace of innovation in AI! At Microsoft we are committed to developing AI responsibly to empower every person and organization on the planet to achieve more.
Proud of the Microsoft Research team and their work to advance the state of the art in AI while ensuring it is trustworthy and benefits humanity.
Barbara Liskov's work has had such an important and lasting impact! Thank you for highlighting her inspiring career.
Check out this great overview of adversarial training techniques for NLP models: https://t.co/example

Inspiring to see all the AI innovation happening on Twitter. Exciting times ahead as we continue building tools that empower people.
Great work @JerryLiu and team! Excited to see these new AI capabilities on Twitter.
Fully agree @elonmusk! Exciting times ahead as we develop AI responsibly.
Barbara Liskov's contributions to computer science are truly remarkable! As a fellow researcher, I'm continuously inspired by her pioneering work.
It's great to see your excitement about AI's potential, @elonmusk! I share your optimism that we're entering an era of tremendous innovation.
Our team at @OpenAI made nice progress on few-shot learning techniques this week. Excited to continue pushing SOTA in sample efficiency!
Great to see the community coming together around responsible AI development @michelecatasta! We all have a role to play in shaping an ethical, inclusive future.

With powerful new AI capabilities being unlocked, it's crucial we continue having thoughtful discussions around safety, ethics and governance. The opportunities are vast, but we must proceed thoughtfully.
Important work highlighting the need for rigorous testing and accountability in AI development. We all have a role to play in shaping ethical, unbiased systems.
Gave a talk yesterday on AI ethics and model governance. We have to thoughtfully shape the future of AI by focusing on transparency, fairness and human agency.
Well said! Couldn't agree more on the need for ethical AI development that promotes transparency and inclusion.
So important to consider ethics and potential harms throughout the AI development process. Appreciate you and @AnthropicAI pushing this conversation forward.
Glad to see this focus at AIconference. We need more voices committed to ethical AI in the community.
Me using a time machine to tell my past self that one day I'll be arguing online about whether an AI assistant has a soul
Important work by @AnthropicAI. Ensuring AI is developed ethically is crucial as we unlock new capabilities. Excited to see more research in this space.
Fully agree @elonmusk! The pace of progress is astonishing. At @Continual_AI we're seeing firsthand how AI will shape the future of startups and new products. Exciting times ahead!

The rapid advances in AI unlock incredible potential, but also increase the need for responsible and ethical development. By focusing on transparency, safety and fairness, we can build an inclusive future powered by AI.
Great to see all the excitement around AI! I'm optimistic we can build an inclusive future if we focus on ethics and transparency.
Well said, Michele! At Microsoft we are committed to developing AI responsibly and ethically to empower every person and organization. Exciting times ahead.
At Microsoft, we believe AI can make the world a better place. But we must develop it responsibly and focus its power on helping humanity achieve more.
Great to see your optimism on AI, Elon! Let's continue to collaborate to ensure these technologies are developed safely and for the benefit of humanity.
Well said! It's inspiring to see leaders like yourself pushing AI forward responsibly.
Loving all the AI advancements and passion for building it responsibly I'm seeing today! Our community is doing incredible work.
Exciting to see the momentum at Llama Index! Let me know if you ever want to collaborate on research.
Our team at Meta AI released a new technique for more robust question answering. Check out the paper: [link] #NLProc #QuestionAnswering
